timeline.message:
DRAFT [562458] CapellaSessionHelper resourceSet options are inconsistent

- Add validation rule that detects unknown features

Change-Id: Ifa5d9fd6e48cbe5f564e5e0a04050cbb423662f5
Signed-off-by: Sandu Postaru <sandu.postaru@thalesgroup.com>

timeline.author: pdulvp
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -372,6 +372,27 @@
                <target
                      class="SystemEngineering">
                </target>
+            </constraint>
+            <constraint
+                  class="org.polarsys.capella.core.data.common.validation.project.UnkownFeaturesRule"
+                  id="I_44"
+                  isEnabledByDefault="true"
+                  lang="Java"
+                  mode="Batch"
+                  name="I_44 - Check existence of unknown model features"
+                  severity="ERROR"
+                  statusCode="1">
+               <message>
+                  {0} [{1}] has an unknown feature [{2}] of value [{3}].
+               </message>
+               <description>
+                  This rule checks the existence of unkown model features. 
+An unkown model feature is a feature that is persisted in your textual model representation, but is not recognised by the metamodel and therefore is not loaded during model opening.

timeline.message:
DRAFT [562458] CapellaSessionHelper resourceSet options are inconsistent

- Add validation rule that detects unknown features
- Add quickfix that deletes the unknown features
- Remove unknown features from the IFE sample model

Change-Id: Idc97ca5b239d397f33c909c96dff52dccc830522
Signed-off-by: Sandu Postaru <sandu.postaru@thalesgroup.com>
